column1: Uchi////Maybe it was the fact that we had heard so many good things about this place before trying it
column2: but after ordering the avo bake
column4: and the asparagus (daily special) as appetizers
column5: we were pretty underwhelmed. The avo bake and the brussel sprouts were okay
column6: but I would never get the asparagus again- miniature portion served in a huge plate with 5 arugula leaves.
